text: The XG9 Lance is a Ship-Launched Fighter manufactured by Ram Tah, produced from 3304 to the present. It is a multirole fighter with Guardian weaponry, known for its substantial damage output, especially against Thargoid craft. It has 3 weapon mounts and no utility mounts.
The XG9 Lance has dimensions of 15.3m x 12.2m x 11.2m, an armor rating of 10, shields of 30 MJ, and a top speed of 316 m/s with a boost speed of 541 m/s.

The XG9 Lance's Gauss Focus Cannon is a projectile weapon with the second highest damage-per-shot (94) of all three Guardian hybrid fighters. It has a moderate rate-of-fire and very high armor piercing, but limited ammo, high heat generation, and reduced effectiveness against shields.
